method.name: Full Exploration using Inconsistent Examples Pairs Measure

reference.ref: H. Liu and L. Yu. "Toward Integrating Feature Selection Algorithms for Classification and Clustering", IEEE Trans. onKnowledge and Data Engineering,17(4), 491-502, 2005.
H. Liu y H. Motoda, Feature Selection for Knowledge Discovery and Data Mining, Kluwer Academic Publishers, 1998.

generalDescription.objective: Feature Selection. This method allows search to follow feature subsets
generalDescription.howWork: This method explores the whole search space exhaustively. This means that each and every solution will be tested against the measure and only the best one in the whole search space will be selected as final result.

method.example:
Problem type: Preprocess Method: FULL-IEP-FS Dataset: Car Training set: car-10-1tra.dat Test set: car-10-1tst.dat Parameters: default values
After the execution of RunKeel.jar we can see the training and test datasets modified only with the selected features.
And the extra file with the classification error in test validation result0e0.txt:
result0e0.txt
RESULTS generated at Sun Jul 04 19:45:04 CEST 2010 -------------------------------------------------- Algorithm Name: Full Exploration (IEP)
PARTITION Filename: ../datasets/car/car-10-1tra.dat ---------------
Features selected: Buying - Maint - Doors - Persons - Lug_boot - Safety -
6 features of 6
Error in test (using train for prediction): 0.2023121387283237 Error in test (using test for prediction): 0.19653179190751446 ---------------
